column2: The Fire Emblem of Elibe. No gem in existence is its equal.
A legendary sword whose power surpasses that of Elibe's eight Divine Weapons.
A healing staff carried by St. Elimine alongside the light tome Aureola.
A spirit-infused sword, sacred to the people of Sacae.
A spirit-infused sword with ties to the mythology of the Sacaen tribes, forged for fighting dragons.
A regalia tome created by a master of elder magic.
A regalia tome created by a master of anima magic.
Heim's light tome. The strongest of the weapons bestowed upon the twelve crusaders.
Fjalar's fire tome, granted by the dragon Salamand.
Ced's wind tome, imbued with the dragon Forseti's will and passion for the good of mankind.
The dark tome that channels the power and consciousness of the earth dragon Loptous.
A dark sword whose sinister power protects its wielder from harm.
A sword blessed by Archbishop Blagi with the power to pierce the protection of dark magic.
A staff capable of curing many ailments, including petrification caused by dark magic.
A common sword of a common material.
A weighty but more powerful sword.
A sword whose mighty blows offset its steep price.
An affordable lance that is easy to wield.
A weighty but more powerful lance.
An affordable axe that is easy to wield.
A weighty but more powerful axe.
An axe whose mighty blows offset its steep price.
A weighty but more powerful bow.
A bow whose might offsets its steep price.
A sword forged of an uncommon material. It is fragile, but very deadly.
A sword made for skilled warriors. It is designed to make powerful blows against an enemy's most vulnerable points.
A sword designed for making multiple consecutive strikes.
A lance forged of an uncommon material. It is fragile, but very deadly.
A lance made for skilled warriors. It is designed to make powerful blows against an enemy's most vulnerable points.
A lance designed for making multiple consecutive strikes.
An axe forged of an uncommon material. It is fragile, but very deadly.
An axe made for skilled warriors. It is designed to make powerful blows against an enemy's most vulnerable points.
An axe designed for making multiple consecutive strikes.
A bow forged of an uncommon material. It is fragile, but very deadly.
A bow made for skilled warriors. It is designed to make powerful blows against an enemy's most vulnerable points.
A bow designed for making multiple consecutive strikes.
A mighty tome named for a legendary thunder spirit.
A ring once blessed by Ninis, a spirit of ice.
A ring once blessed by Filla, a spirit of fire.
A ring once blessed by Thor, a spirit of lightning.
A ring once blessed by Set, a spirit of wind.
An amulet of the god Delphi. Protects fliers from arrows.
A device that negates enemy critical attacks.
Swiftsole boots that increase movement speed.
A scroll with techniques on becoming more proficient with many different weapons.
A treasure said to improve defense.
A treasure said to improve luck.
A treasure said to improve skill.
A treasure said to improve resistance.
A card that provides discounts at many shops.
A card that grants the bearer purchasing privileges at special shops.
A staff used to restore health to a nearby ally.
Greatly restores health to a nearby ally.
Fully restores health to a nearby ally.
A staff that cures ailments and restores targets to normal condition.
Warps a distant ally to the vicinity of the caster.
Restores health to a distant ally.
A staff that puts targets to sleep. Carrying it also protects the wielder from magic-induced slumber.
A staff that prevents targets from using magic for a short time.
A staff that drives targets into a berserk rage.
A draught that boosts magical resistance. The effects grow weaker with time.
A common healing item that restores a small amount of health.
A potent vulenary capable of treating more serious wounds.
A magical draught that can fully restore the drinker's strength.
